rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance lobby with Scandinavian minimalistic design elements, featuring clean lines and light colors.

rooms.name: Living-Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living and dining space that incorporates natural light and a neutral color palette; features Scandinavian furniture and built-in shelving for art.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchenette designed with modern appliances, minimalist cabinetry, and ample storage solutions.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated private gym area equipped with essential fitness equipment, soundproofing for privacy, and integrated storage for workout gear.

rooms.name: Library/Study
rooms.description: A cozy library space with built-in bookshelves, comfortable seating, and soft lighting to create a quiet retreat within the penthouse studio.

vastu_considerations.notes: Ensure that the living and dining area is oriented towards the north to maximize natural light and positive energy. The private gym and library have been strategically placed in quieter zones, with openings designed for ample ventilation.

plot_irregularities.notes: The design accommodates an irregular plot by using flexible partition walls and non-traditional room shapes to optimize space usage.
